_sText:
**NOTE: Not all places of the map could be covered up in the images, so [here is an album of 28 screenshots covering the whole map(linky)](http://imgur.com/a/zrSfx#0 "")**

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/y0QLRY3OKX0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

**_The Plot_**
========

Mr.Breen was working in his office as usual, but 1 day he saw via his window that _thugs_ who have _kidnapped 4 scientists_ are working on something bad.

_Mr.Breen calls the police_ and informs them about this. The _police sends the CT force_ to rescue the hostages(in this case, the scientists)

The T's order the _scientists to create a certain chemical which makes explosives_.

**_While T's protect them from the police and supply them technology, the CT's arrive in time and get armed to fight the terrorists and resuce the scientists._**

**_The Environment_**
=====================

Birds are chirping on the tree merrily when everything is right.
A pool with 2 restrooms in the middle of the map.
The Tspawn is a farmhouse.
The CTspawn is Mr.Breen's office.
A subway which links the CTspawn, Tspawn and the middle of the map.
A storage room in the subway.
Graffiti's here and there.

**_The Notes_**
===============

**My most detailed map as of now. Took me  3-4 weeks to complete.**
It is an edit of this map [click me](http://gamebanana.com/css/maps/165517 "")
The displacements at the Tspawn had many issues but devieus,alex,.kataS helped me a-lot to fight them of. The 3D skybox was a bit of a problem as I could'nt get it right with the right textures.[the forest]
A PROTIP: Press "E" to open the door.  xP
Any problems/bugs, please comment so that I can learn from my mistakes.
